!Iason Heine: Of course it is! This document is 1500 years old, my child. The fact that it is still eligible at all is a miracle in its own right--most parchment this old is little more than dust and ash these days. But this... this is remarkable! The one document binding Shunaiman and the Merchants together... in my very hands. A historian's dream....
